name: Post
description: PotionBrewEvent.Post is fired when a potion is brewed in the brewing stand. The event is fired during the TileEntityBrewingStand#brewPotions() method invocation. #brewingStacks contains the itemstack array from the TileEntityBrewer holding all items in Brewer. This event is not Cancelable . This event does not have a result. Event.HasResult This event is fired on the MinecraftForge#EVENT_BUS .
